name: Gray River's Representative
desc: After every 10 stack(s) of "Critical Boost" obtained by all allies or after defeating any enemy target, fires 10 Lux Arrow(s) to attack random enemy targets. Each Lux Arrow deals Wind DMG equal to 300% base DMG. Each Lux Arrow will cause "Murmur" to deal DMG equal to 30% of the original DMG, and cause "Murmur" to gain Charge equal to 20% of the total sum of ally characters' ATK.
